title.narrative: Growth and Employment in States Programme- Support for Meat and Leather Industry (GEMS 1)

description.narrative: This activity (Growth and Employment in States Programme- Support for Meat and Leather Industry (GEMS 1)) is a component of Growth and Employment in States Programme (GEMS)- reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £8,820,161. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Business Policy and Administration, Livestock, Small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) development. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 10-09-2008 and the end date is 30-03-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: General Economic, Commercial and Labour Affairs - Economic Affairs - General Economic, Commercial and Labour Affairs - investment promotion
Industry - Economic Affairs - Industry - development and services
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2015 Quarter 2
